title: New Website Launch!
body: Check out our new and improved website! Better navigation, updated info, and easier ways to get involved.

title: House #153 Underway
body: Construction has begun on our 153rd home! We're excited to help another family achieve their dream of homeownership.

title: Completed 152nd Home
body: We're proud to announce the completion of our 152nd home! Another milestone in our mission to provide affordable housing.

title: First Donation from Macy's Distribution Center
body: We received our first generous donation from Macy's distribution center! Thank you for supporting our mission.
